\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w chose|strong="G1586"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w foundation|strong="G2602"\w* \w of|strong="G0026"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unspotted \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G2714"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* charity.

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* hath predestinated \w us|strong="G1519"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w adoption|strong="G5206"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* children \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* unto \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*: \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w purpose|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* remission \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w sins|strong="G3900"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*,

\w That|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w might|strong="G1473"\w* \w make|strong="G1107"\w* \w known|strong="G1107"\w* unto \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* \w of|strong="G2307"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w good|strong="G2107"\w* \w pleasure|strong="G2107"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w purposed|strong="G4388"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* dispensation \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* fulness \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* re-establish \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w called|strong="G3739"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* lot, being predestinated \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w purpose|strong="G4286"\w* \w of|strong="G2307"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* worketh \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w* \w of|strong="G2307"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*.

\w That|strong="G0846"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w may|strong="G5547"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w* hoped \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w after|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w had|strong="G3739"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, (\w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*;) \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w believing|strong="G4100"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w were|strong="G3739"\w* signed \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*,

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w pledge|strong="G0728"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w our|strong="G3739"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w*, unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* acquisition, unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

Wherefore \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w that|strong="G0191"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* towards \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*,

\w Cease|strong="G3973"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w give|strong="G2168"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w making|strong="G4160"\w* commemoration \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G2168"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w*,

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w enlightened|strong="G5461"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* may \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* exceeding \w greatness|strong="G3174"\w* \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* towards \w us|strong="G1519"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* operation \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w might|strong="G2479"\w* \w of|strong="G1411"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*,

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* wrought \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, raising \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* setting \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* places.

\w Above|strong="G5231"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* principality, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* virtue, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dominion|strong="G2963"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w come|strong="G3195"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w subjected|strong="G5293"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath made \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w over|strong="G5228"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w*,
